data.text: Ni ɗa ɠɛna zeini daami wosuʋɛ taɓali ɠa,
Ta ɠula ɗa-ʋului la,
Mina daamiani pagɔiti nɔ ʋɛtɛ,
Mina ɓɔɠɔ ɓɔlɔ ga è ɓɛtɛ vai,
È ɠɛɛzu nɔ, è ɠaazulo naavoloi ʋa, tɔun é ɓega ga ɲɛɛlɛ,
À mina ɓɔ daamiani ma, wa nui é ga ziiʋodɔɠɔ nui,
Mazɔlɔɔ nui ʋe kpegai na ga deve, é ɠɛ ma: «Laami, è ɓɔɔle.»
Ɗa unpili ga ma ɓuɠai è miai,
Mina ɓɔɛ faaɠaaɠalala nui ʋɔ,
Mina kwɛpelema wɔlɔzaɠagi maavalibo,
Tɔɔzei ti unmɔɔ nu wola ɠa ná,
Yiilɔɔ maaɠoloi wu, è sɔlɔɔsu,
Mina inɛinɛ ga è-loin maaɠolo vai,
Naa ɠa zoo é kaka faiti kpudɛ maazu,
Dòun zunu, ni ɗa ɠilina ɠimalai ʋa ga è-yii pɛ,
Siɛgi zu è ɓɔɛzu la ga gaamai,
Mina ɠaazuɠula faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ʋelela ʋelei zɔlɔɔ,
Woilo gòo ma ga pagɔ, dòun zunu, è ɠɛ ga ɠima nu,
Mina ʋilɛ dɔɔ ɓɔle nuiti polu,
Mazɔlɔɔ dɔɔ ɓɔle nuiti, ta ɠulukpu nuiti, ta ɗa gaaɓela nimizai zu,
Woilo è-ɠɛɛ wooi ma, nii é è zɔlɔɔga,
Gaamai ɠaiziɛ, ta ɠimalai, ta kalagi, ta faawuuzumɔgi,
Telebo nui kɛɛɠɛ ɠa ɗa ɠɛ koozunɛɛi zu ɠɔ,
È-ɠɛɛ ta è-lee ti ɠoozunɛ è ma,
Dòun zunu, la nɔ̀un da,
Mazɔlɔɔ koloɠolo anzanui ɠa ga zeɠezaɠai suɠoozaai,
Toɠa ɗa pele ɓɔungi wo, eɠɛ toosu nu,
Ɓɛ ɠa é kpeei loozu ga: «Ee, dèe, màanɔɠɔa»?
Naati, niiti ti lɛbisu dɔɔ ɓɔlezuʋɛ,
Mina wɛlɛ dɔɔi ʋa pelei ʋa,
Toɠa ɗa gaaɓela ga, é nui ɲi eɠɛ kaalii,
È-ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa faa ɠiligiti ka,
Toɠa ɠɛ è ɠisu, eɠɛ ɗa ɠɛ laani kpoloɗɛi zaamaʋɛ,
È ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Ta dòɠazu, gaa la wanazu ga ze,
